title: Google play update causing my speakers is distort like crazy. No HW changes. It happened overnight
content: I was promted to restart after  a auto pushed Google Play update thru the nigh, and now my perfectly functioning Pixel 2 XL is unusable. Speakers are distorted and cant listen to videos, use speaker phone, or even make phone calls. Tried all the troubleshooting steps possible. Factory reset, etc.
